courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: CWL 241 and CWL 242; or one year of college literature; or consent of instructor.
description: Analysis of several important world-views in Western civilization (such as classical, Romantic, modern, and so forth), studied comparatively and in relation to selected figures in Western literature. Prerequisite: CWL 241 and CWL 242; or one year of college literature; or consent of instructor.
label: Literature and Ideas
sectionDegreeAttributes: Literature and the Arts, and Western Compartv Cult course.
